issue.title: [CF 34] Errors in TellMeWhen 1.5.4
issue.body:
I'm seeing the following errors on logging in.  They're causing most of the icon settings (size, show states, etc.) to be off.

Date: 2010-11-06 17:04:42
ID: 1
Error occured in: Global
Count: 3
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua line 719:
   attempt to perform arithmetic on field 'UnAlpha' (a nil value)
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:719: TellMeWhen_Icon_Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:518: TellMeWhen_Group_Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:412: TellMeWhen_Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:235:
      TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:221

Date: 2010-11-06 17:05:21
ID: 2
Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua line 1429:
   attempt to index a nil value
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua:1429: TellMeWhen_Icon_OnMouseDown()
   [string "*:OnMouseDown"]:1:
      [string "*:OnMouseDown"]:1

Date: 2010-11-06 17:05:18
ID: 3
Error occured in: Global
Count: 18
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua line 1420:
   attempt to index a nil value
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen_options.lua:1420: TellMeWhen_Icon_OnEnter()
   [string "*:OnEnter"]:1:
      [string "*:OnEnter"]:1


> Posted by CurseForge user spyd3r0x | Imported from CurseForge issue #34 | Raw

comments.body:
Should be fixed in 1.6.0, beta version should be coming soon


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
